text: Death to Smoochy is a 2002 American black comedy movie, directed by and starring Danny DeVito and co-starring Robin Williams, Edward Norton, Catherine Keener, and Jon Stewart. The movie received mixed reviews from critics and failed at the box office during its release, but in recent years it has become a famous cult movie. ==Cast== * Robin Williams as "Rainbow" Randolph Smiley * Edward Norton as Sheldon Mopes / Smoochy the Rhino * Danny DeVito as Burke Bennett * Catherine Keener as Nora Wells * Jon Stewart as Marion Frank Stokes * Melissa DiMarco as Tara * Pam Ferris as Tommy Cotter * Michael Rispoli as Spinner Dunn * Harvey Fierstein as Merv Green * Vincent Schiavelli as Buggy Ding Dong * Danny Woodburn as Angelo Pike * Robert Prosky as Network chairman * Louis Giambalvo as Sonny Gordon ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2002 comedy-drama movies Category:2002 crime drama movies Category:2000s criminal comedy movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:German comedy movies Category:German drama movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:British criminal comedy movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies directed by Danny DeVito
title: Death to Smoochy
